services.title: Our Automation Solutions
services.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive suite of automation services designed to streamline your operations and drive growth.

service1.title: Automated Time & Attendance
service1.description: Optimize workforce management with a simple QR or link-based clock-in system. Generate error-free reports by location, date, or team, ready for payroll and HR.

service2.title: Intelligent File & Backup Automation
service2.description: Organize your digital files automatically by date, client, or type. Implement secure, automated backups to your disk or the cloud, ensuring data integrity and accessibility.

service3.title: Digital Internal Requests
service3.description: Streamline internal requisitions for supplies, support, or transfers with a centralized digital form. Eliminate paperwork and track every request with detailed reports.

service1.title: WhatsApp & Social Media Data Capture
service1.description: Automatically extract key customer data—like names, orders, and addresses—from WhatsApp and social media chats. Organize information instantly and send automated confirmations.

service2.title: Digital Sales & Service Logging
service2.description: Record every transaction or service from any device. Centralize your data in real-time for instant, actionable insights without expensive or complex systems.

service3.title: Automated Customer Follow-Up
service3.description: Boost retention with automated alerts for inactive customers. Send personalized reminders, promotions, and messages to encourage repeat business.

service1.title: Automated KPI Reporting
service1.description: Get daily or weekly reports on key metrics like sales, top products, and profits. Delivered in ready-to-use Excel or PDF formats without manual formula creation.

service2.title: Automated Expense & Performance Analysis
service2.description: Upload your raw data, and our system generates clear financial balances, performance percentages, and insightful summaries, ready for partners and stakeholders.

service3.title: Weekly Activity & Milestone Consolidation
service3.description: Empower teams to log their achievements, and our system will create a dynamic, visual report. Perfect for tracking progress and keeping everyone aligned, updated weekly.

service1.title: Automated Endpoint Scanning
service1.description: Proactively monitor Windows/Linux devices for suspicious tasks, unauthorized software, or large files. Keep your tech team informed with automated alerts and reports.

service2.title: Scheduled File & Folder Cleanup
service2.description: Automate the secure deletion of old or duplicate files based on rules you define. Prevent storage saturation and ensure compliance.

service3.title: Custom Script & Process Automation
service3.description: Program daily tasks like exporting, copying, or renaming to run automatically. Save time, eliminate human error, and boost overall efficiency.
